Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-22

## Active Technologies

- TypeScript (>=5), Angular 20 + `@angular/core@20`, `@angular/router`, `@ngrx/signals`, `@angular/material`, `parquetjs-lite` (or browser-friendly parquet parser - see research.md), `prettier`, `eslint` (Angular ESLint) (001-doc-chat-spa)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript (>=5), Angular 20: Follow standard conventions
